channel.title: Removing PK
channel.description:
ok i downloaded project czar and it has PK every were or mostly and i was wonting to know how to remove that + the symbol and disallow PK unless ur in the normal wildy area like in RS?
how could i do this and also no one answered my other post
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,244420.0.html

item.title: Removing PK
item.dc:creator: @shadow1993 shadow1993
item.description:
@shadow1993 wrote:

[quote=“Tyrael, post:11, topic:183053”]Do you want no pk period? or what i don’t understand :s

If you want no pking AT ALL and all free-zone just do like

|| (absX >= 0000 && absX <=9999 && absY >=0000 && absY <=9999 )

-tyrael-[/quote]

ya i wont all NON PK zone but i just wont normal WILDY areas like in RS were it has to go above varrock for PK else its non PK zones for rest of game unless u go really north on Member areas…

Read full topic

item.title: Removing PK
item.dc:creator: @fr000b fr000b
item.description:
@fr000b wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:6, topic:183053”]ok go to client.java and search for “nonwild”
should get something liek this

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3248 && absX <= 3262 && absY >= 3441 && absY <=3429 ) ||

after the “||” add in this

(absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >=YYYY  && absY <=YYYY ) ||

ok from here you have the nonwild code. to put it in effect simple use coords.
now your working with abs’s so it goes is squares. but you cant just use any corner of the square, u have to use the top left corner and the bottom right.
remember
top left:
X1 Y1
bottom right:
X2 Y2
order to put in the nonwild code!!! IMPORTANT
X1 X2 Y2 Y1
remember to put in that order and u wont have any problems. and if u decide to add more remember to always have “||” behind every code

:)[/quote]

wow lmao thast alot eaiser to folo then some guides ive seen and its 5x smaller

Read full topic

item.title: Removing PK
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

Do you want no pk period? or what i don’t understand :s

If you want no pking AT ALL and all free-zone just do like

-tyrael-

item.title: Removing PK
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

ok go to client.java and search for “nonwild”
should get something liek this

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3248 && absX <= 3262 && absY >= 3441 && absY <=3429 ) ||

after the “||” add in this

(absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >=YYYY  && absY <=YYYY ) ||

ok from here you have the nonwild code. to put it in effect simple use coords.
now your working with abs’s so it goes is squares. but you cant just use any corner of the square, u have to use the top left corner and the bottom right.
remember
top left:
X1 Y1
bottom right:
X2 Y2
order to put in the nonwild code!!! IMPORTANT
X1 X2 Y2 Y1
remember to put in that order and u wont have any problems. and if u decide to add more remember to always have “||” behind every code
